# description of columns with IBD probabilities: 
#  column  1: both alleles inherited from parent 1
#  column  2: both alleles inherited from parent 2
#  column  3: both alleles inherited from parent 3
#  column  4: both alleles inherited from parent 4
#  column  5: heterozygous, parents 1 and 3
#  column  6: heterozygous, parents 1 and 4
#  column  7: heterozygous, parents 2 and 3
#  column  8: heterozygous, parents 2 and 4
# 
# probability random allele of an individual derived from parent i, 
# where c[k] refers to the columns as defined above: 
#
#  P(parent=1) = c[1] + 0.5*c[5] + 0.5*c[6]
#  P(parent=2) = c[2] + 0.5*c[7] + 0.5*c[8]
#  P(parent=3) = c[3] + 0.5*c[5] + 0.5*c[7]
#  P(parent=4) = c[4] + 0.5*c[6] + 0.5*c[8]
#
